mapper.select: SELECT b.bno, b.mid, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bcategory, m.mnickname AS "battachoname", b.battachtype, b.battachdata, b.bhitcount, b.bcreatedat, b.benabled FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON b.mid = m.mid WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE benabled = 1

SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE benabled = 1
AND btitle like '%${word}%'
AND bcontent like '%${word}%'
AND mid like '%${word}%'
AND (btitle like '%${word}%' OR bcontent like '%${word}%')
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE benabled = 1 AND bcategory = #{category}

SELECT rnum, bno, mnickname as mid, bcategory, btitle, bcontent,bcreatedat, bupdatedat, bhitcount FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, bno, mnickname, bcategory, btitle, bcontent, bcreatedat, bupdatedat, bhitcount FROM ( SELECT bno, mnickname, bcategory, btitle, bcontent,bcreatedat, bupdatedat, bhitcount FROM board b INNER JOIN member m on b.mid = m.mid WHERE benabled = 1
AND btitle like '%${word}%'
AND bcontent like '%${word}%'
AND mnickname like '%${word}%'
AND (btitle like '%${word}%' OR bcontent like '%${word}%')
ORDER BY bno desc )
WHERE rownum <= #{pager.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{pager.startRowNo}
